Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/10/1988 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1990, off Dan Plesac (LAD)...
Injured on 4/5/1990 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1990, off Danny Cox (ATL)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Montreal on 7/10/1991...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 7/24/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1992, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,414,286 through salary arbitration...
